rename.to: Impossible to process requests having a gzipped body

rename.from: Impossible to process requests having a gzipped body
rename.to: [2.5.x] Impossible to process requests having a gzipped body

body:
In your example, you're using 

```
$curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Content-Encoding: gzip" -X POST http://localhost:9000/foo --data-binary "@body.json.gz"
```

Please try with `Transfer-Encoding`:

```
curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Transfer-Encoding: gzip" -X POST http://localhost:9000/foo --data-binary "@body.json.gz"
```

@wsargent I'm also seeing this behavior (`Play 2.5.4`).

**uncompressed**: 

```
curl -v -i -X POST http://192.168.99.100:9000/foo \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --data @bar.json

* Trying 192.168.99.100...
* Connected to 192.168.99.100 (192.168.99.100) port 9000 (#0)
> POST /foo HTTP/1.1
> Host: 192.168.99.100:9000
> User-Agent: curl/7.43.0
> Accept: */*
> Content-Type: application/json
> Content-Length: 149
>
* upload completely sent off: 149 out of 149 bytes
< HTTP/1.1 200 OK
< Content-Length: 0
< Date: Fri, 17 Jun 2016 21:12:14 GMT
```

**compressed**: 

```
curl -i -v -X POST http://192.168.99.100:9000/foo \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -H "Transfer-Encoding: gzip" \
  --data-binary @bar.json.gz

* Trying 192.168.99.100...
* Connected to 192.168.99.100 (192.168.99.100) port 9000 (#0)
> POST /foo HTTP/1.1
> Host: 192.168.99.100:9000
> User-Agent: curl/7.43.0
> Accept: */*
> Content-Type: application/json
> Transfer-Encoding: gzip
> Content-Length: 144
>
* upload completely sent off: 144 out of 144 bytes
< HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request
< Content-Length: 140
< Content-Type: application/json
< Date: Fri, 17 Jun 2016 21:15:52 GMT
```
This will be fixed when Netty 4.0.38.Final will be released.

issue.title: fixes gzip with http content decompressor
Fixes #6152 by customizing the HttpContentDecompressor

repository.name: playframework
repository.description: The Community Maintained High Velocity Web Framework For Java and Scala.

issue.body:
Fixes #6152 
This implements what jroper suggested https://github.com/typesafehub/netty-reactive-streams/pull/19#issuecomment-226998199

Akka Test is pending until fixed (it can't decode deflate/gzip yet)

body: This is a netty bug: netty/netty#5428. It will be fixed in the next release of netty, and #6257 is a workaround.

Thank you @schmitch & @gmethvin !
Where would it be a good place to have a regression test for this?
I created that external project because I didn't really know where to go to write a test.
